data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="iPlanetAMPlatformService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="amPlatform"  i18nKey="iplanet-am-platform-service-description"  propertiesViewBeanURL="../service/SCPlatform30"  resourceName="platform"  revisionNumber="30"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/iPlanetAMPlatformService" >
            <Global hideConfigUI="no"  validate="yes" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey=""  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serviceObjectClasses"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>iplanet-am-platform-service</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a102"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-platform-locale"  order="100"  resourceName="locale"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>en_US</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a103"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="iplanet-am-platform-cookie-domains"  order="200"  resourceName="cookieDomains"  syntax="string"  type="list" >
                </AttributeSchema>
                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="com-sun-identity-sites"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="site"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="sites"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                        <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="accesspoint"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="details"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                            <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="primary-siteid"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                            <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="primary-url"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                            <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="secondary-urls"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="secondary-siteid"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                            </SubSchema>
                        </SubSchema>
                    </SubSchema>
                </SubSchema>
                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="com-sun-identity-servers"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="server"  realmCloneable="yes"  resourceName="servers"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serverid"  resourceName="id"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="parentsiteid"  resourceName="siteId"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serverconfigxml"  syntax="string"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="serverconfig"  syntax="string"  type="list" ></AttributeSchema>
                    </SubSchema>
                </SubSchema>
            </Global>
        </Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
